Headline: Kimball-bound Brown Line Service Delayed near Western
ShortDescription: Kimball-bound Brown Line trains are standing near Western due to a fire near the tracks. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Kimball-bound Brown Line trains are standing near Western due to a fire near the tracks.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines. These may include: #81 Lawrence.

Shuttle buses have been requested between Damen and Kimball to provide connecting service.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
